channel.title: Amerika'
channel.description: I've decided to have a change of heart. AMERIKA' did something wrong to my forums yes, but I influenced his ban on a forum that had nothing to do with that indecent. It was my idea that he should be banned, but on these forums he did nothing. I think AMERIKA' should quit being an idiot and I think that I should stop being an asshole to every person i (kind of) hate. Now it's up to the vote and to mitb.

item.title: Amerika'
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:42, topic:354666”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=451237.msg3307515#msg3307515 date=1281755659]
I vote for the ban to be universal across all services of this community, including IRC.
[/quote]

I agree. We don’t like spammers, trolls, or script kiddies around here, and he is all of those wrapped up into one. He isn’t banned because of Javafire, he is banned because I was sick of his spamming/trolling/script kiddie activities. The end.[/quote]

You were sick of it? Sorry but we rarely see you on this side of the forum and other then the last ban how many times did you take action against his account? If this ban is placed soley because you are sick of it then I think we need a revote because it is the rest of us that were dealing with it, not you.

Read full topic

item.title: Amerika'
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

I felt like I needed to post on this, even though it’s locked, sorry guys.

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:38, topic:354666”]I love AMERIKA`

We’ve given other dedicated members second chances, I don’t see why this should be an exception. Might I remind you, we’ve given Telenim chances? Plus, I’ve talked to Wade and he says the only thing he would be contributing to is the development section and General Programming. He has no business anywhere else. If things start to get out of hand, we will handle it accordingly. Only reason I see for him to stay banned is because the staff are too lazy to deal with him again if he does get out of hand. I for one will personally handle any problems he may cause and will take full responsibility for his actions.[/quote]

Just an fyi, Telenim will not be getting unbanned. That seems like a rather large burden to carry around if you wish to be responsible for his actions, I wouldn’t exactly see that as a smart decision.

Regardless guys, he’s had his chances, he was muted every couple weeks, which is more than enough to call for a ban. There is really no need to discuss this further.

Read full topic
